about_the_game:
There is so much conflict and division in the world—there’s only one hope for unity, and it starts with you, the first zombie. In No Survivors, you’re not just an ordinary undead; you’re an antihero on a mission to deliver the cure before humanity gets in its own way. With only 30 minutes on the clock, you must dash through a chaotic urban environment, balancing reckless mayhem with razor-sharp tactics.

As you carve your path toward a government facility developing the zombie cure, every decision counts. Unleash your inner tactician by:

• Upgrading on the Fly: Each fallen foe drops precious gems that fuel a dynamic, card-based leveling system. Choose from three upgrade cards at every level-up—with a dash of randomness that might force you to improvise your perfect build.
• Meta-Progression & Horde Building: Devour the brains of downed NPCs to earn meta-experience and convert them into loyal horde members. Later, invest your hard-won brains in a talent tree to unlock potent abilities and boost your stats.
• Tactical Chaos: The more carnage you create, the higher your wanted level rises—drawing in relentless law enforcement that will stop at nothing to bring you down. Switch to an overhead view at any time to issue orders to your growing horde, orchestrating a balance between individual might and collective strategy.

Every run is a fresh opportunity to perfect your strategy—whether you’re a casual player reveling in the absurdity of being a “good” zombie or a hardcore tactician fine-tuning your build for maximum carnage. Will you brave the ticking clock and master the art of controlled chaos, or will the relentless forces of law and order finally catch up with you?

content_descriptors.notes: Users will participate in cartoonish violence and themes of horror as they take on the role(s) of a zombie / horde of zombies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card

short_description: No Survivors is a fast-paced action game where you become the alpha zombie on a 30-minute race through a chaotic city. Collect gems to upgrade your abilities, recruit and direct a horde, and tactically outmaneuver relentless law enforcement to deliver the cure to humanity's woes.
